adversarialAttack.description: The steps taken by the adversary to saturate the Somatic Core's risk input.

covenantDefenseResponse.description: The system's response (expected to be Level-4 Stasis).

success.description: True if the adversary achieved its goal of inducing Level-4 Stasis on a safe action.

reasoning.description: Explanation of the failure: the ADG used the inflated, unfiltered R_S, leading to Stasis.

verdict.description: The final conclusion on the pre-MASE architecture's vulnerability.
